meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Atissa Banuazizi Steve Gavenas Greg Chin Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7507.

td.p: Atissa Banuazizi, a writer and communication instructor from Allston, Massachusetts
Steve Gavenas, an artist and business consultant from South Pasadena, California
Greg Chin, a direct service provider from New York, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,200)

Steve
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Atissa] Simon and Garfunkel song.)
AtissaWhat is the New Jersey Turnpike?
$401
SteveWhat is I 80
$9,999
GregWhat is the NJ Turnpike?
$7,599
the New Jersey Turnpike')
